snippet: The police say members of a paramilitary force in the Indian-controlled portion of Kashmir opened fire on hundreds of villagers who were protesting against power shortages.
abstract: Police say members of a paramilitary force in the Indian-controlled portion of Kashmir opened fire on hundreds of villagers who were protesting against power shortages, killing one person and wounding two others.
lead_paragraph: The police say members of a paramilitary force in the Indian-controlled portion of Kashmir opened fire on hundreds of villagers who were protesting against power shortages.
